Interface NutFilterHolder

All Known Implementing Classes:
CssInspectorEngine, CssUrlLineInspector, HtmlInspectorEngine, JavascriptInspectorEngine, TextInspectorEngine
public interface NutFilterHolder

This interface represents an objects that can be configured with a list of NutFilter.
